entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
